title: Thunderbird for Android sends messages over the Internet from home, but not over the Internet in a cafe
creator: Tombarkas
content: Hi. For a long time, I've noticed that emails I send from home are sent, but those I try to send with the same settings do not get sent when connected to the Internet in 4 out of 4 cafes. My ISP, Zen, hasn't been able to explain why. I've tested whether Google VPN blocks it somehow, and it doesn't. I normally use Thunderbird. Today, I found that, in the same cafe, messages I tried to send using Thunderbird failed to send, whereas there was no problem with GMail, Proton Mail or Outlook. Any suggestions?

title: Password
creator: ben4
content: I cannot remember my password: how do I get access to my email messages? Ben Tatham ben@thetathams.co.uk
